release_notes: MAJOR FEATURE: Full multi-SDR detection and configuration system. Setup wizard now auto-detects all connected RTL-SDR dongles as Step 1, allowing individual configuration (1090 MHz/978 MHz/Disabled) with gain settings. New API endpoints: /api/sdrs/detect, /api/sdrs/configure, /api/sdrs/current-config. Enhanced detect-all-sdrs.sh script with JSON output. Each SDR individually configurable with dropdown selection and gain control. Automatic dump978 activation when 978 MHz assigned. Complete dual-band setup in wizard.
